title: Toy Soldiers Complete (Mac OS X)
description:
Bring your toys back to life with the original Toy Soldiers and Toy Soldiers: Cold War, now bundled together with all DLC packs: Kaiser's Battle, Invasion! , Napalm and Evil Empire. That's both Toy Soldiers games and all DLC in one $45-value bundle!

===================================================================================

This is the Steam version of Toy Soldiers Complete. This includes Toy Soldiers and Toy Soldiers Cold War along with all DLCs released for both game.

===================================================================================

Notes:

1. This is a WineSkin Port. I am not a porting professional so do not expect this to be a perfect port. There may be some bugs but the game is, overall, playable.

2. I found a bug in the training mission during the boss fight where the Antonov would suddenly disappear or sink to the ground making it impossible to finish the mission. This is not a bug in the port, and is also present in the Windows version of the game. The only solution is to repeat the "wave" and hope the boss doesn't disappear on you again.

3. I haven't finished testing this yet but I am halfway through the campaign and I have yet to experience a gamebreaking bug. (There is one though where you change the settings of the shadows and the game crashes but its a rare case and the solution is to simply reopen the game).

4. Enjoy!
